name: Harry Potter
movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: The young wizard with a lightning bolt scar.

name: Hermione Granger
movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

name: Ron Weasley
movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

name: Lord Voldemort
movie: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: Voldemort is a dark wizard who seeks to dominate the wizarding world and is famously known as Harry Potter's nemesis

name: Frodo Baggins
movie: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: The young hobbit who embarks on a perilous journey.

name: Aragorn
movie: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: The skilled ranger and protector of Frodo.

name: Gandalf
movie: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: The wise wizard guiding the fellowship.

name: Luke Skywalker
description: The young Jedi who battles the Empire.

name: Princess Leia
description: Leader of the Rebel Alliance and Luke's sister.

name: Legolas
movie: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: Elven archer, allies with Aragorn, unlikely friend of Gimli.

name: Gimli
movie: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: Dwarf warrior, Legolas' unlikely friend, part of the Fellowship.

name: Darth Vader
description: Sith Lord, Luke's father, apprentice to the Emperor.

name: Emperor Palpatine
description: Sith Master, manipulative leader, Vader's master.
